Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- 23 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District Proposition
(Millage Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 23 mills tax continuation for the Parishwide School District for employee benefits and retiree insurance.
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of the Parish of Bienville, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a twenty-three (23) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $7,061,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for the payment of costs of employee benefits and retiree insurance?
